DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to describe relationships among whey protein when consumed before a meal on food intake and pre- and post-meal satiety, blood glucose in healthy young adults.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Whey Protein on Short-Term Food Intake and Post-Meal Blood Glucose Response in Young Men
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized, cross-over design study was conducted. Whey protein preloads (10-40 g) were provided in 300 ml water. At 30 min following consumption, subjects were fed an ad libitum pizza meal. Satiety, and blood glucose were measured at baseline and selected intervals pre- (0, 15 and 30 min) and post-meal (50, 65, 80 and 95 min).
DOC.criteria: healthy normal weight ( 1824.9 kg/m²) young aged 2027 year old breakfast skippers smokers dieters individuals with diabetes (fasting BG ≥ 7.0 mmol/L) or other metabolic diseases
